title: Palm Beach
creator_credit: Albie Thoms and Albie Thoms Productions
brief_description: A quasi-documentary fiction film about the suburban sub-culture of of Sydney’s northern beach areas. It is, simultaneously, a fast-paced thriller involving surf, drugs and rock n roll. Forty eight hours in the lives of a handful of young Australians. Paul was looking for work … Joe was looking on. Stars Nat Young and Bryan Brown. Rated: M
